description: Welcome to your private, gated front yard entrance facing a peaceful street with plenty of parking — a rare mix of privacy and convenience in the heart of Richmond. Located in the sought-after Hampton’s Gate community, this updated 3 bed + den (used as a 4th bedroom) townhome offers a bright, inviting layout with thoughtful updates throughout. The main level features two balconies; including a serene one off the kitchen, perfect for morning coffee or sunset unwinding. Freshly painted interiors, accent walls, new lighting, and refreshed kitchen & baths with modern finishes give the home a warm, polished feel, plus a new hot water tank (2025). Close to Richmond Centre, Lansdowne Mall, SkyTrain, HWY 99, and a short walk to Garden City Park, Anderson Elementary & McNeil Secondary.
